featured.text: Named “Velcro,” from the French words velours (velvet) and crochet (hook), the new product received a patent from the Swiss government in 1955.

definition.zh_def: 用鉤針編織的技術或工藝，通常用於製作衣物、裝飾品等。
definition.en_def: A method of creating fabric by interlocking loops of yarn with a hooked needle.
definition.example: She learned to crochet a blanket for her new baby.
